response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense worth for me. I understand that its true value may be subjective to you, but I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal collection. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, aiming to ensure both a fair transaction and a chance for us to explore mutual benefits. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you through every step of this process.", "product_price": 950000}
